commands.name: az eventgrid namespace permission-binding create
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace permission-binding create --name
                                                 --namespace-name
                                                 --resource-group
                                                 [--client-group-name]
                                                 [--description]
                                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--permission {Publisher, Subscriber}]
                                                 [--topic-space-name]
examples: az eventgrid namespace permission-binding create -g rg --namespace-name name -n permission-binding --client-group-name client-group --permission publisher --topic-space-name topic-space

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace permission-binding delete
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace permission-binding delete [--ids]
                                                 [--name]
                                                 [--namespace-name]
                                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--subscription]
                                                 [--yes]
examples: az eventgrid namespace permission-binding delete -g rg --namespace-name name -n permission-binding

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace permission-binding list
commands.summary: List all the permission bindings under a namespace.
examples: az eventgrid namespace permission-binding list -g rg --namespace-name name

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace permission-binding show
examples: az eventgrid namespace permission-binding show -g rg --namespace-name name -n permission-binding

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace permission-binding update
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace permission-binding update [--add]
                                                 [--client-group-name]
                                                 [--description]
                                                 [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--ids]
                                                 [--name]
                                                 [--namespace-name]
                                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--permission {Publisher, Subscriber}]
                                                 [--remove]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--set]
                                                 [--subscription]
                                                 [--topic-space-name]
examples: az eventgrid namespace permission-binding update -g rg --namespace-name name -n permission-binding --client-group-name client-group --description test

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace permission-binding wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
